paragraphs: This document explained the process of creating a technical document.
This document outlines the steps to create a technical document within the retailcloud console. It is intended for users who need to generate documentation for various processes within the system.
This guide will walk you through the process of creating a technical document, from initial setup to final approval and sending to the vendor.
outcomes: Understand the steps involved in creating a technical document.
Learn how to navigate the retailcloud console to create a technical document.
Familiarize yourself with the different options and settings available during the creation process.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Navigate to the Inventory section.
Steps / How-To.step: Click on "Inventory" in the left navigation sidebar.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Access the Purchase Orders section.
Steps / How-To.step: Click on "Purchase Orders" under the Inventory section in the left navigation sidebar.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Initiate the creation of a new purchase order.
Steps / How-To.step: Click the "Create PO" button.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Click on the Vendor Code input field to select a vendor.
Steps / How-To.step: Click the Vendor Code input field.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Select a vendor from the dropdown list.
Steps / How-To.step: Choose a vendor from the dropdown list, for example, "Cosmetics".

Steps / How-To.explanation: Click on the Phone input field to enter the vendor's phone number.
Steps / How-To.step: Click the "Phone" input field.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Enter the vendor's phone number.
Steps / How-To.step: Enter the vendor's phone number in the "Phone" input field, for example, "09207917777".

Steps / How-To.explanation: Enter the vendor's address.
Steps / How-To.step: Enter the vendor's address in the "vendorAddress" textarea.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Click on the calendar icon to select a date.
Steps / How-To.step: Click the calendar icon next to the PO Due Date field.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Select a date from the calendar.
Steps / How-To.step: Choose a date from the calendar interface, for example, the 3rd of the month.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Confirm the selected date.
Steps / How-To.step: Click the "Ok" button to confirm the selected date.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Click on the Vendor Terms textarea to enter the vendor's terms.
Steps / How-To.step: Click the "vendorTerms" textarea.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Enter the vendor's terms.
Steps / How-To.step: Enter the vendor's terms in the "vendorTerms" textarea, for example, "Ship within 2 weeks".

Steps / How-To.explanation: Click on the calendar icon to select a date.
Steps / How-To.step: Click the calendar icon next to the Vendor Ship By Date field.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Select a date from the calendar.
Steps / How-To.step: Choose a date from the calendar interface, for example, the 3rd of the month.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Confirm the selected date.
Steps / How-To.step: Click the "Ok" button to confirm the selected date.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Click on the calendar icon to select a date.
Steps / How-To.step: Click the calendar icon next to the PO Expiration Date field.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Select a date from the calendar.
Steps / How-To.step: Choose a date from the calendar interface, for example, the 17th of the month.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Confirm the selected date.
Steps / How-To.step: Click the "Ok" button to confirm the selected date.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Click on the Location input field to select a location.
Steps / How-To.step: Click the Location input field.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Select a location from the dropdown list.
Steps / How-To.step: Choose a location from the dropdown list, for example, "Kerala".

Steps / How-To.explanation: Click on the Location input field to select a store.
Steps / How-To.step: Click the Location input field.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Select a store from the dropdown list.
Steps / How-To.step: Choose a store from the dropdown list, for example, "Kollam Store".

Steps / How-To.explanation: Click on the PO Terms input field to select PO Terms.
Steps / How-To.step: Click the PO Terms input field.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Enter the shipping address.
Steps / How-To.step: Enter the shipping address in the "shippingAddress" textarea.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Click on the Shipping Comments input field to select shipping comments.
Steps / How-To.step: Click the Shipping Comments input field.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Select shipping comments from the dropdown list.
Steps / How-To.step: Choose shipping comments from the dropdown list, for example, "Ship all the Items to the Kerala Warehouse".

Steps / How-To.explanation: Click on the Freight input field to select freight charges.
Steps / How-To.step: Click the Freight input field.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Select freight charges from the dropdown list.
Steps / How-To.step: Choose freight charges from the dropdown list, for example, "Freight only".

Steps / How-To.explanation: Click the "Item Lookup" button to add items to the purchase order.
Steps / How-To.step: Click the "Item Lookup" button.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Select items from the item lookup grid.
Steps / How-To.step: Select the checkboxes next to the items you want to add to the purchase order.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Click the "Select Items" button to add the selected items to the purchase order.
Steps / How-To.step: Click the "Select Items" button.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Enter the quantity of the item.
Steps / How-To.step: Enter the quantity of the item in the QTY field, for example, "100".

Steps / How-To.explanation: Click the "Save" button to save the purchase order.
Steps / How-To.step: Click the "Save" button.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Click the "Approve" button to approve the purchase order.
Steps / How-To.step: Click the "Approve" button.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Enter approval notes.
Steps / How-To.step: Enter approval notes in the "PO approval notes" textarea, for example, "Approving Purchase Order".

Steps / How-To.explanation: Click the "APPROVE" button to confirm the approval.
Steps / How-To.step: Click the "APPROVE" button.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Click the "Send To Vendor" button to send the purchase order to the vendor.
Steps / How-To.step: Click the "Send To Vendor" button.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Navigate to the Merchandise Receiving section.
Steps / How-To.step: Click on "Merchandise Receiving" under the Inventory section in the left navigation sidebar.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Initiate the receiving of merchandise.
Steps / How-To.step: Click the "Receive Merchandise" button.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Select a vendor.
Steps / How-To.step: Select a vendor from the dropdown list, for example, "Cosmetics Vendor".

Steps / How-To.explanation: Check the "purchase order" checkbox.
Steps / How-To.step: Check the "purchase order" checkbox.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Select a PO.
Steps / How-To.step: Select a PO from the dropdown list, for example, "2025/6/2/38".

Steps / How-To.explanation: Enter the quantity of the item received.
Steps / How-To.step: Enter the quantity of the item received in the QTY Received field, for example, "95".

Steps / How-To.explanation: Click the "RECEIVE" button to receive the merchandise.
Steps / How-To.step: Click the "RECEIVE" button.

Title: Creating a Technical Document
shortDescription: Step-by-step instructions for creating a technical document.
